about_the_game:
If you want to unlock all achievements and short paths of the game as well as make your own wallpapers with the images, it's a perfect choice. In other words, you'll buy:

  • A pdf with detailed information on how to defeat opponents more easily, short paths to follow, adult scenes localization, and much more;
  • 7 adult scenes in HD resolution from the current version (or 34 frames of lewd content);
  • 6 adult scenes in HD resolution and without background from the old version (or 17 frames of lewd content);
  • 11 concepts (clothed and semi-clothed) from the old version;

To access it, you need to go to:

Location:
C:\Program Files (x86)\Steam\steamapps\common\Yuki's Tale\Beginner Pack

The current guide is Yuki's Tale - Guide.

name: Yuki’s Tale - Beginner Pack

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows XP/Windows Vista/Windows 7/8/10
  • Processor: 2 GHz
  • Memory: 128 MB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9.0 Compatible
  • Storage: 5 MB available space

short_description: This pack contains a Walkthrough Document and all adult scenes from Yuki's Tale in HD resolution (the current and the old version).
